content.question: Write an essay that analyzes the rhetorical choices Eliza Stacey makes to achieve her purpose of persuading her father-in-law to help her family once more.

frqParts.text: Write an essay that analyzes the rhetorical choices Eliza Stacey makes to achieve her purpose of persuading her father-in-law to help her family once more.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
